name: DetailColumn

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the detail column field.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name of a standard field, the ID of a custom field, or the API name of a bucket field that has detailed data.

methods.name: getDataType
methods.description: Returns the data type of a detail column field.

description: Contains methods for describing fields that contain detailed data. Detailed data fields are also listed in the report metadata.
